title: Devils Knot 2013 DVDR R4 NTSC ENG
description:
In 1993, in a poor community of West Memphis, Arkansas, three children eight years old - Stevie Branch, Christopher Byers and Michael Moore - disappear from the neighborhood. After an extensive search, their bodies are found the next, beaten and bound day. The community and the police are convinced that the killings were the work of a satanic cult, due to the violent nature of the crimes. A month later, three teenagers - Damien Echols, Jason Baldwin, and Jessie Misskelley Jr. - were arrested when Misskelley confessed the crime after four hours of questioning. They are brought to trial, but all claim innocence, bringing the story to an unexpected turn. 

Title in Brazil: No Evidence
